item.description:
The hike will be on a combination of bike path, hiking and equestian trails and some fire service roads.  The hike will be through some of the least explored parts of the park, going through beautiful forested areas with a few gradual hills. Plan on hiking about 4.5 miles.

Children and good dogs are welcome. There are picnic tables at the East entrance parking lot, so you might come early and enjoy lunch in the forest before the hike. We will ask for donations to help pay for this meetup site.

Meet at 12:45 PM at East entrance parking lot just as you enter MSSF on Long Pond Road. If you are coming from Carver, be sure to look at the MSSF Forest map found in "Files". It takes about 20 minutes to drive from the Carver entrance to the Plymouth entrance.
item.how_to_find_us: East park entrance - Long Pond Road

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: First Sunday Hike - Friends Trail
